## R Markdown

```{r}
# https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/widyr/vignettes/united_nations.html

library(dplyr)
library(unvotes)
library(widyr)

cors <- un_votes %>%
  mutate(vote = as.numeric(vote)) %>%
  pairwise_cor(country, rcid, vote, use = "pairwise.complete.obs", sort = TRUE)

China_cors <- cors %>%
  filter(item1 == "China")

China_cors
```
